title: Anyone having login issues?
body: I have been trying to log in for about an hour now, I dont know if it is just me or if anyone else is having a problem logging in? The NA server says it is up, but I am not able to log in I keep getting Connection Error.

replies.body: Are you still having any issues?  It sounds like your network is failing to connect to the login server, but we can get that fixed up!  Just go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Uninstalling and reinstalling helped me get back in.
doing a repair on the client by clicking the ? on the top right
That's the same here. I'm currently uninstalling and reinstalling just to see if it works.
